conbody.p: The detailed documentation for a selected component artifact in the Component Landscape view or the component respective to subroutine currently opened in source editor is displayed in T24 Doc view. This view has three sections (aka tabs) each one for overview, tables and batch. When an item is selected (by double click) in the Component Landscape view or opening a subroutine in source editor, then this view is activated with the overview section holding the description for the selected item. The tables section holds the tables belong to component of the selected item and Batch section displays the details of batches and jobs belong to the component of the selected item.

In addition to it, T24 Doc view has web-page/word document link available on the right top corner of the view (see below image), which will bring you the web-page/word document contains more details about that component within RTC Editor when you click on it.
